extracted_rules.Title: Light well & stairwell standards & site planning

Qualifiers.Scope: Light wells and stairwells in site planning
Qualifiers.Applicability: All structures with light wells and stairwells

Dimensional.Name: Combined length of all excavated features
Minimum distance from side lot line

Numerical values.Name: Minimum distance from side lot line

Procedures: Public Works Department must approve drainage system

Mandatory: Features may not be located on the side of the structure that faces the front yard
Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring trees

Logical dependencies: a + b (encroaching features) may not exceed 15'
a + b + c + d (all features) may not exceed 30% of the perimeter of the basement
